channel.title: What's a good base? PI -> Delta
channel.description:
wich source base do you guys think i should use ? PI ( name of it? ) or Delta ( name of it ? )
encountered a errors with PI, but anyways suggest a good base for either PI or Delta thanks :)

item.title: What's a good base? PI -> Delta
item.dc:creator: @Marine5288 Marine5288
item.description:
@Marine5288 wrote:

[quote=“iz3 legend, post:3, topic:398368”]Lemee explain some diffrent bases quickly.

Delta
This is A good server for begginers and can teach some basic Java. Overall it is pretty stable but not the best along the lines of playing.

PI:
This Server is good because it has very good combat and its very clean. Everything is organized nicley but its not the most stable server you could find. I learned coding basically off Java lectures then using what i learned to code a PI server.

Hyperion:
This is a very stable base but is very blank. If you havent coded alot you probably shouldn’t try to use this one. Ive been coding about 4 months (im still not that great) and I still haven’t got it down. So if you’re newer I wouldn’t start on it just yet.[/quote]

Project Insanity is more stable than a Delta.

@xxifish i x, I would recommend using a Project Insanity source because it’s stable and it can help you learn more. There are many tutorials for

Project Insanity, so I would recommend as a starting look here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good base? PI -> Delta

item.title: What's a good base? PI -> Delta
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

People complain about how something unstable is, but I sure as Hell don’t see people fixing that problem. To be honest, all bases or sources are fine to start with, or program off with. All of them have downsides, some are fairly enough programmed, and some are terriblely programmed.

You can choose which one to program but please note that it will take some time for it to be stable and such.

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good base? PI -> Delta

item.title: What's a good base? PI -> Delta
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Delta is far from glitch free and its insanley messy.

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good base? PI -> Delta

item.title: What's a good base? PI -> Delta
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

It may be cleaner than delta but that doesn’t make it very clean. Also my delta source had 80+ online at a time with no lagg.

Released the source, it was a fun energetic server with easy combat, hardish skills max 135 etc.

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good base? PI -> Delta

item.title: What's a good base? PI -> Delta
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

i have experience running servers with both, and basically if it is your first server i would say delta, it is much simpler then project insanity and with a good base can be fun and glitch free. within a week you can have a nice community with 5-10 players online at once.
however if you know what you are doing, then use a project insanity source, for the sole reason of it can get more players. ive never seen a small delta or allstar server with more then 20 players online. PI servers can get 25-50 in a couple weeks, but only if they stand out from the competition.
the worst option would be to do a PI server but just leech hybridpvp source and host it without changing shit. you will have no players and your server will fail unless you are really marketing the shit out of it. but its definitely the worst. unless you are mentally retarded you will have no trouble getting the hang of delta in a week or two.

[quote=“demps2k9, post:4, topic:398368”][quote author=iz3 legend link=topic=495503.msg3622749#msg3622749 date=1307576912]
PI:
This Server is good because it has very good combat and its very clean. Everything is organized nicley but its not the most stable server you could find. I learned coding basically off Java lectures then using what i learned to code a PI server.
[/quote]

PI may have pretty good combat but I assure you that it isn’t very clean.[/quote]
compared to delta its the cleanest shit in the world, everything is organized in separate packets not just thrown into client.java.

Read full topic
